assertion.name: Ethics
assertion.value: In the present study, the data of the RENAC public health surveillance system was used.The data are anonymized. Therefore, the study is within the specific answers in Resolution 1480/2011 of the Ministry of National Health in Argentina (Guide for Research with Human Beings), which states that “the sources of health systems, official health programs, or public health surveillance in which is not no possibility of individual identification are not subject to evaluation by an Ethics Committee.”
